pullrequest.title: Allow putting GUI headers in src/gui and move resources into src/gui

content.raw:
The requirement to include the `moc` file sounds like a breaking change. See pull request #563 for an example of a GUI system that currently works, and should still work after this PR is merged.

Besides being a breaking change, requiring the inclusion of `moc` files concerns me from the usability point of view. Maybe we'll need to keep some stuff in the include folder?
content.html:
The requirement to include the moc file sounds like a breaking change. See pull request #563 for an example of a GUI system that currently works, and should still work after this PR is merged.

Besides being a breaking change, requiring the inclusion of moc files concerns me from the usability point of view. Maybe we'll need to keep some stuff in the include folder?
